title: Spotify + League, want player to show in game.
body:
Hey guys, 

Just wanted to know if I could get my spotify currently playing song and artist to show in game? Like an overlay.

Thanks. ^.^

replies.body: You could try Overwolf, it will allow you to have lots of different things come up while in-game, and not just in League. I don't know if they've got something for Spotify though and if they do I don't know if it will be what you want.

Nah brother if your League is full screen I don't think it's possible. But I'm able to make my currently playing iTunes song come up if I have League in windowed mode. Spotify should be the same, try the settings :)
I'll give it a go thanks bro. :)
